Hong Song Nam exchanges greetings with Malaysian Prime Minister
articles.content:
Hong Song Nam exchanges greetings with Malaysian Prime Minister
    Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, Premier of the DPRK cabinet, exchanged messages of greetings with Datuk Seri Dr Mahathir Bin Mohamed, Prime Minister of Malaysia, on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Malaysia.
 Hong Song Nam in the message of greetings expressed the belief that the excellent friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in conformity with the interests and desire of the two peoples in the future, too, and sincerely wished the government and people of Malaysia progress and prosperity.    
 The Prime Minister of Malaysia in the message of greetings reiterated the keen interests and efforts of Malaysia to further consolidate and develop the excellent state relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Delegation of ministry of metal and machine-building industries leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of ministry of metal and machine-building industries leaves
    Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the ministry of metal and machine-building industries led by its minister Jon Sung Hun left here today to visit Russia and China.

articles.title: Sympathy to Sudanese President
articles.content:
Sympathy to Sudanese President
    Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of sympathy to Omar Hassan Ahmed al-Bashir, President of Sudan, on July 12.
 I extend deep sympathy and condolences to you and the bereaved families, upon hearing the sad news that a plane crash in Sudan claimed many human lives, the message said.
